name: Screamo Therapy
description:
This game requires a mic!

How else to power through a long, hard day than to scream? Play as Scribble and help him get to his spool before the time is up. Screaming channels more power that makes the world speed up!

Controls: 

> WASD or arrow keys to move

> Spacebar to jump

> YELL to speed up!

> ESC to exit the game

Credits:

> Tobey-Julian Joseph: Programmer, Level Design, Git Master,

> Kiria Bentley: Character Art, Foreground Artist, Lead Animator

> Vincent Colavita: Lead Music Composer

> Shawn Flynn: Lead Backdrop Artist, Lead UI Art
